name: BBC-rex
description:
This game is inspired by Dinosaur Game, also known as T-Rex Game and Dino Runner from Google Chrome and I wrote it for the Retro-Trex game jam of  Retro Programmers Inside https://rpinside.itch.io / and Phaze101 https://phaze101.itch.io/

Run as far as you can while avoiding obstacles such as cacti, rocks, birds, etc.

Every 50 points you go to the next level

The game is written in BBC-Basic and you can run it on a BBC Micro emulator like BeeBem. Copy and paste the source code inside BeeBem and then type RUN to start the game.

To jump use the SPACE key, to duck the Z key

Feel free to download and play it and tell me if like or have suggestions
